item.title: About Me
item.description: On the Internet I am generally known as Grasshopper, or “Gafanhoto” in Portuguese. I have already lived around age years on the planet earth and I hope to live the normal amount of time for a human being of my generation. I’m currently on the second year of my master’s degree, the “Thesis year”. function calculate_age(dob) { var diff_ms = Date.now() - dob.getTime(); var age_dt = new Date(diff_ms); return Math.
